alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 9:43PM EST until March 11 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River from Seymour through Williams. .Minor flooding is ongoing along the East Fork White river and several tributaries due to 1.5 to 3 inches of rainfall that fell Friday March 3rd. Flooding along the East Fork White River is expected from Seymour to Williams, with the crest through Seymour. Flooding along many smaller tributaries that has not already ended will end by Tuesday. Flooding will continue through the end of the week on the lower portion of the East Fork White River river. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River near Bedford. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 21.2 feet, At this level during December 2013 backwater reached the tailwater of Lake Monroe as Salt Creek stopped falling. The crest of the river followed 2 days later and reached 27.6 feet at Bedford and caused Salt Creek to rise nearly 6 feet at the tailwater of Monroe Lake. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 21.6 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
